A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In post- colonial 1960s Ireland, a girl with Dystonia – a neurological disorder leading to uncontrolled and severe muscle spasms which makes horses quite nervous - takes over Horse Whisperer duties so the family can pay off their loans. They begin a battle against nature and tradition while dealing with secrets.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century.
